name: IBM MQ V9 with a custom script on a single virtual machine - IBM
description: Install and configure IBM MQ V9 on a single Linux virtual machine. Configuration includes a Queue Manager and executes a user defined script.

metadata.longDescription: Install and configure IBM MQ V9 on a single Linux virtual machine. Configuration includes a Queue Manager and executes a user defined script.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
  2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM MQ V9.0 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSFKSJ_9.0.0/com.ibm.mq.helphome.v90.doc/WelcomePagev9r0.htm
  3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
